name: Crow
description: Elegant pair of earrings in black and gold, a pair of handmade 24k gold vermeil lotus petal hoops has been teamed with two large pieces of faceted onyx which I've topped with more gold in the form of fancy bead caps.

name: Tangerine Dream
description: Zingy pair of earrings in orange and gold, a pair of handmade 24k gold vermeil lotus petal hoops come with two juicy pieces of orange quartz which I've topped with citrine briolettes.

name: Stone
description: Stone coloured taupe agate beads mixed with fancy gold vermeil bead caps and hung on a handmade pair of 24k vermeil lotus petal hoop earrings.

name: Red Sky
description:
Warm summer evenings and red sky, these are a great shade of pinkish red cut in an unusual shape and hung simple from a pair of gold vermeil pear drops.

With handmade ear wires these measure 5cm.

name: Slow Dancer
description:
Lovely coloured tear drops of purple amethyst made into interchangeable drops and hung on a pair of handmade gold vermeil hammered hoop earrings, light weight and great for going out or everyday.

The total length of the hoops and amethysts are 4.2 cm, like all of my jewellery these are one of a kind.

name: Apple Blossom
description: Large pieces of pale blossom pink quartz with lots of facets for sparkle have clusters of rose pink mystic quartz briolettes, which are all hung on a pair of handmade sterling silver lotus petal hoops.

name: Celandine
description:
The earrings are a really lovely shade of pale violet or celandine blue, a matched pair of emerald cut quartz made into earrings that are one of those dress them up or down pieces.
 Hung on 24k gold vermeil ear wires this sparkly pair of earrings are great at any time of year.

name: Orchid
description:
These are a pair of ooak earrings in a fantastic shade and cut of purple quartz that look like amethysts, they are just eye popping and as well as colour they're a huge carat weight of 41.78 for the pair.
I've kept them simple with elegant sterling ear wires and sterling silver pendant bails which I've used to attach them to the wires.
The length of the earrings is 4.3cm from the top of the ear wires with the stones themselves measuring 2cm.

name: Titania
description:
“I know a bank where the wild thyme blows, Where oxlips and the nodding violet grows,Quite over-canopied with luscious woodbine,
With sweet musk-roses and with eglantine.” 

These lovely 8 cm pale frosted shades are what come into my head when I think of Titania from a Midsummer Night's Dream, pale pink rose quartz bezel set into 24 k gold vermeil, finished with frosted lilac and a final drop of pink rose quartz.

name: Sprinkles
description: Pretty pair of handmade chandeliers made with sterling silver ovals and ear wires, the lavender pink Brazilian amethysts are a whopping cm across and are perfect for a larger pair of earrings.

name: Queen
description:
Regal pair of ooak earrings with large baroque pearls, they start with a secure closing pair of 24 k gold vermeil hoops and have been teamed with sage green amethyst briolettes. I've added some simple vermeil bead caps for some extra sparkle and these earrings would pretty much take you from day through to night.

The size of these from the top of the ear wires are 4.8cm.

name: Caramel
description:
Clean lines for an elegant pair of earrings, made with large oval cut cognac quartz toppad with gold vermeil caps and simple gold vermeil hoops, these are perfect to dress up or down and at a combined carat weight of 40.02 carats are easy to wear.
The length of these is 5.5cm from the top of the hoops and like all of my jewellery are one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Sweetwood
description:
Rich deep brown pair of 40.26 carat smokey quartz , with  gold vermeil filigree beads and brushed vermeil ear wires  make a striking pair of earrings which are comfortable and easy to wear.

These measure 4 cm from the top of the ear wires and are available for layaway.

name: Barbi
description:
Vibrant pink that you can see coming !

Two large pieces of hot pink quartz mixed with natural pink sapphires and a smattering of 24k gold vermeil make this one of a kind pair of danglers.

name: New Spring
description:
Serious ooak dangles, made with sterling silver, lemon quartz and fresh water pearls.
These are a fun pair of earrings made with chunkier tapered ear wires with secure hooks, I've added pearls and topaz for a free flowing pair of earrings perfect for summer.

These are 8 cm in total length and like are my jewellery are one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Apatite
description:
Fabulous deep apatite coloured quartz in a marquise cut teal blue, mixed with hand faceted apatite rondelles and finished off with gold vermeil wire and a pair of hand made hammered vermeil ear wires, really striking and 5cm in total length.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique item.
Available for layaway.

name: Comet
description: These are really pretty earrings in ivory and sterling silver, made with fresh water pearls that have been set with two white topaz in white gold and finished with sterling silver chain comet tails.

name: Ceylon
description:
Striking pair of ooak earrings in Ceylon blue and white, startling with gold vermeil Euro wires I added two pieces of bezel set sapphire from India and large pieces of Ceylon blue coloured quartz for a pair of eye popping danglers.

These are something you could either dress up or down and are something that I would wear with jeans and t shirt and the length of these is 4.7cm

name: Candied Apricot
description:
Pretty coloured one of a kind earrings in a dusky apricot.

A pair of handmade daisy studs to start and are mixed with Arizona sunstone briolettes and peach fresh water pearls, with a final flourish of large faceted peach quartz drops.

These are 6.5 cm long from the top of the daisy.

name: Droplets
description:
Fun pair of earrings with lots of movement, I have something similar in moonstone and wear them with jeans so they're good for casual or to dress up a bit.

Three strands of hand wired tanzanite briolettes with natural freshwater pearls make a stunning pair of chandeliers earrings.

name: Mocha
description:
These are a huge pair of 2cm x 2cm 50.83 carat smokey quartz earrings, made with cushion cut stones which give extra flash and sparkle and a simple pair of gold vermeil hoops, striking and wearable and like all of my other jewellery one of a kind.

These measure 3.5 cm from the top of the hoops.

name: Valentine
description: It couldn't get any brighter with these one of a kind fuschia pink earrings, gold vermeil  huggie hoops are paired with quatrefoil turquoise, pink sapphires and quartz drops for something flirty.

name: Louisa
description:
I made a pair of these for my friend Louisa who has worn hers to death with every outfit variation possible and I decided to make them my only multiple item on the website as she's always asked where she got them.

Large hoops in your choice either sterling silver, gold vermeil or filled gold with a mixture of different sized natural pearls. The hoops measure 2.5cm and with the pearls they have a drop of 4.8cm and are perfect to wear every day.

name: Lemon Drops
description:
Summery pair of earrings in a lovely soft yellow, made with two lemon quartz briolettes totalling 39 carats hung from two large vermeil pears and finished gold vermeil Euro wires with secure fastening.

These are one of a kind and great to wear either with a summer dress or team with something more formal.

name: Skylark
description: Palest of sky blues in these earrings with large pieces of faceted quartz, I've kept them simple by adding sterling silver twisted ovals and a pair of bezel set topaz ear wires to complete the look, perfect colouring for blonds.

name: Glam
description:
Pure glam with these earrings, a mixture of creamy white pearls and beautiful pink sapphire briolettes.
Pearls and sapphires separated by tiny faceted gold vermeil beads, complimented with fancy bead cap and pretty twisted ear wires, the whole earring coming in at just over 7 cm in total length.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.

name: Breakfast at Tiffany's
description:
Fantastic coloured Tiffany blue Arizona turquoise earrings, I've added two fresh water pearls and chalcedony in the same lovely shade of blue.
Mixed with some 24k gold vermeil for some pizazz, these are really light weight and so pretty.

name: Nightshade
description:
The second of some large purple quartz briolettes I have, these are a pair of 47.97 carats which area beep violet colour the colour of deadly nightshade.
There are two large briolettes of African amethyst which are a perfect colour match and compliment the quartz perfectly, finished with some sterling silver hoops for simplicity.

These measure 4.5 cm from the very top of the hoops.

name: Sweet Pea
description:
Statement earrings for a night out, in different shades of pale pink.

Pale pink Kunzite quartz rectangles with pink amethysts and a scattering of rose coloued Indian sapphires, also beautiful for anyone going to a summer wedding.

name: Lupin
description: Show stopping earrings in a lovely clear shade of blue, 24k gold vermeil eurowires have been added to diamond shaped chalceony and blue quartz faceted drops, I've finished with filigree bead caps for extra sparkle.

name: Garden Fragrance
description:
Soft and shimmery light weight green and gold earrings, made with large fated oval of rare green aquamarines.
I've colour matched some amethysts in the same lovely pale sage green and added a scattering of more green aquamarines to finish this femine pair of earrings.

name: Seadrifter
description:
A pair of 6.7 cm earrings made with rare ondine blue coloured larimar a stone that is only found in the Dominican Republic.

Sterling silver ear wires start these earrings with a pair of sky blue topaz quartz, in the center are pear cut larimar beads and at the bottom two large tear shaped pearls finish the look.

name: Sahara
description:
These are a really pretty colour, my photos do not do them justice.

A pair of ooak gemstone earrings made with 28 x 19 mm untreated rose cut sapphires in a deep plum colour which are bezel set into 24k gold vermeil, teamed with gold vermeil small hoops these are elegant enough for an evening out but simple enough to wear with jeans.

name: Horizon
description:
Earrings in a stunning shade of clear blue the colour of the horizon, a smaller elegant pair of light London blue topaz from Russia.
A more unusual chequer board cut, these ovals weigh 27.98 carats for the pair simply wired with a pair of gold filled blue topaz ear wires.

They are 3.5 cm from the top of the ear wires and like all of my jewellery are available for layaway.

name: Grape
description:
A truly one of a kind pair of earrings in a deep shade of violet, made with a mixture of African amethysts in different cuts and sizes these define the word show stopper.

A pair of secure Euro wires are added to two huge amethysts and a shower of gems, finishing in two faceted pears.

name: Bubblegum
description: Cute girlie bracelet made with bubblegum pink quartz briolettes, at the center is a gold vermeil hand of Fatima charm and I've  used a secure clasp to keep it safe . This is 18cm long and would be a great stacking bracelet

name: Blanco
description:
Fabulous chunky stretch bracelet made with vintage porcelain beads, put mixed with sterling silver bead caps and a sterling silver bead this is great for traveling and holidays because it's easy to slip on and off.

This comes with a cute pair of earrings with the same sterling silver bead caps.

name: Cloud
description:
Chunky ooak bracelet made with big round druzy beads which makes a perfect statement piece.
This is on elastic so is great for something to take on holiday as it slips off and on easily as you're traveling and swimming ( I know because my bangles always ping at the airport !) I've kept it simple and added five pieces of amethyst in different shades and cuts for some colour so this would take you all the way through summer to winter.

name: Star Gazer
description:
Perfect casual bracelet to wear with jeans and a T, a mix of unusual square and briolette cut rainbow moonstones from India that catch the light and compliment the  blue sapphires and freshwater pearls.

Kept simple with a gold vermeil hook clasp and daisy spacers, this is a 19 cm bracelet

name: Blue Yonder
description:
Cute feminine  bracelet made with dozens of tiny turquoise beads hand wired with 24k gold vermeil wire, finishes with a S clasp which is framed by two gold vermeil beads.

Like all of my jewellery this is one of a kind and available for layaway and measures 20cm.

name: Meadow
description:
A wonderful array of shades in this one of a kind bracelet, made from Californian watermelon tourmaline. Deep bottle green through to dark dusky pink mixed with seven creamy freshwater pearls, gold vermeil daisy spacers and finished with a simple gold vermeil toggle clasp and charms.

This piece is 18 cm in length and available for layaway.

name: Merlin
description:
A mens bracelet in deep violet African amethysts, a gemstone known for healing and protection, this piece is 21.5 cm long and has a focal bead handmade in sterling silver.

Like all of my jewellery this is one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Ice
description: Cool colours in this 8 inch piece, made from large 10mm faceted rondelles of rainbow moonstone with a large pearl drop, blue topaz and aquamarine charm this is a charming femine bracelet.

name: Candied Pink
description: Soft shaded 20 cm  bracelet in pink and white, with large pearls, mystic pink quartz and rainbow moonstones, in between there are also smaller freshwater pearls in the same clear ivory.

name: Chocolate
description:
These warm chocolate  coloured fresh water pearls are such a perfect colour you can almost smell the cocoa beans. Mixed with gold vermeil daisy spacers between each pearl and dark tourmalines to finish off this is such a great bracelet to go with your winter wardrobe.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique item.
Available for layaway.

name: Pink Lady
description:
A vibrant pink bracelet which is 21 cm long, made from smooth twisted cut chalcedony beads, hand wired with gold vermeil wire. I've added pink rubies and mystic pink topaz and finished with two gold vermeil charms of Fatimas hands.

Available for layaway.

name: Summer Meadow
description:
Over our garden wall there are meadows which in the summer are full of summer flowers ,yellows,pink and white amongst the acres of green.

In this ooak piece there are smooth cut citrine nuggets, pink amethyst and white rainbow moonstones, amongst these are smaller stones of green apatite, prehnite, aqua and yellow sapphires which compliment the gold vermeil beads and clasp.

The total length of this is 19 cm and like all of my jewellery is available for layaway.

name: Blue Seclusion
description:
I'm constantly amazed by the colour of gemstones depending on where they're from and what gases were there thousands of years ago when they were being formed
Amazing large 5mm briolettes of  deep teal blue from Madagascar which I've strung simply with a piece of sliced geode in the same shade, and teamed with gold vermeil toggle to use the gemstone as the clasp.

name: Monet
description:
A really true clear lilac clolour, a pair of ooak stretch bracelets of faceted jade.
One bracelet has a slice of raw aquamarine and a sterling silver saucer bead while the other comes with a large intricate sterling bead snd a small cluster of charms with a baroque pearl, aquamarine and lovely AA tanzanite pear drop.
These are perfect for holidays as they slip on and off so easily ay airports and poolside.

name: Denim
description:
Casual bracelet made with denim blue faceted sapphires and sterling silver beads and clasp, I've added a freshwater pearl and a diamond shaped sapphire in a paler shade of blue for added interest.

This is 18cm in length and like all of my pieces is available for layaway

name: Sea Shell
description:
I love the colour of these pearls, a warm pinky peach shade the colour you find inside giant conch shells, these  just glow.
A 22 cm bracelet of fresh water pearls mixed with a complimentary colour of topaz blue, charms of chalcedony and aquamarine are clustered onto a sterling silver bail which is set with blue topaz stones.
And as the devils in the detail the bracelet is matched with a pair of sterling silver earrings of the same peach pearls and bezel set topaz ear wires.

A one of a kind set available for layaway.

name: Confetti
description:
I made petal confetti for my cousins wedding with flowers from my garden and then put the idea into a bracelet.

A colourful mix of shapes and sizes, from red to pale blue, ruby,aquamarine, quartz, amethyst, topaz, apatite, sapphire,peridot and rose quartz mixed together with gold vermeil beads to make an 18.5 cm bracelet.

name: Summer Border
description:
This bracelet has heavenly soft pastel shades found in country gardens across England in wide summer borders.
Pinks,lilacs, yellow, green and blue mixed together in a more tranquil  confetti bracelet with sterling silver and multi gemstones to make a 19 cm finished piece. 
I've used pink sapphires, green, lilac and violet amethysts, rainbow moonstone, tanzanite, rock quartz, apatite and aquamarines. 
To finish off I've used a tanzanite quartz connector that I've used as a clasp and a cluster of gemstone charms

name: Deep Purple
description:
Great coloured bracelet in a deep shade of violet, made with purple jade on elastic to make it easy to get on and off.
The mix of charms form a pretty cluster with a marquise bezel amethyst, a faceted pear, smooth rounds and gold vermeil beads for extra sparkle.

name: Tranquil
description: Beautiful large amethysts in a pale shade of sage green made into a bracelet, I've added a large green oval aquamarine in the same subtle shade and sterling silver clasp, the final detail is a sapphire bead charm.

name: Grace
description:
These stones are just awesome in every way, big bold sparkly pieces of micro faceted Brazilian amethyst.

They range in size from 6 to 8mm and are the biggest amethysts I've had, finished with a 24k gold vermeil s clasp and a bezel set violet amethyst which can be removed and worn as a pendant on a chain.

Ooak 19.3cm bracelet with clasp.

name: Love
description:
Lovely gift for a girlfriend, a hand made embossed sterling silver heart with a red ruby charm kept simple on a 16 inch sterling silver chain - a perfect keepsake.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.

name: Arizona
description: Pendant in sterling silver and Arizona turquoise on a 16 inch sterling chain, this is a simple piece and is made with a long turquoise drop and a sterling silver patterned bead.

name: Mystic Lady
description:
A cute choker necklace made with mystic rainbow quartz briolettes which catch all  colours of the spectrum. 
The focal is a charm cluster made with a gold vermeil Hand of Fatima  with rock quartz briolettes,  pink sapphire and a tanzanite bead.

This piece is 40 cm long and can be wound twice round the arm for a wrist wrap bangle.

name: Goddess
description: A simple but striking ooak pendant made with 24k gold vermeil beads and chain and a smooth pear cut Arizona turquoise and a faceted blue topaz briolette, hung on a 17 inch chain.

name: Bordeaux
description:
The colours of wine country, a large deep coloured amethyst with a trail of mixed berry tones.
Garnet, amethyst, tourmaline and citrines, mixed together with sterling silver to form a trailing cluster which sits just below your collar bone.

name: Silver Cross
description:
Denim blue coloured iolite beads strung with a scattering of small sterling silver beads, finished with a sterling silver dimpled toggle measuring 43.5 cm in length.
The pendant is a sterling silver cross which can be removed from the necklace and worn separately on a chain.

name: Moon goddess
description:
Really pretty necklace made with AAA rainbow moonstones that shimmer and glow, each one has been hand wired onto a 17 inch sterling silver chain. 

Perfect for a Christmas gift because of the sparkle, this would also be great in the summer with pastels.

name: Low Tide
description:
A swell of sea spray comes together in this fun every day piece in greens and aquas. 
This necklace has a mixture of fresh water pearls and gemstones, aquamarine, pale green amethysts and a scattering of twilight blue sapphires, finished with gold filled chain this piece measures 47cm and like all of my jewellery is one of a kind.

name: Pink Gin
description:
Elegant station necklace in pink and gold.

Smooth pink Peruvian opals which have been topped and tailed with pretty pink sapphires from Sri Lanka, all hung from gold filled chain to make a simple but elegant piece measuring 59cm/23 inches.

name: Mermaid
description:
Pastel shaded pendant in aquas and sea green, this is a pretty feminine piece made with a mix of gemstones and freshwater pearls.

Sterling silver binds pearls, apatite, chalcedony and aquamarine together in a waterfall pendant which is hung on a 16 inch sterling silver chain.

name: Great Wall
description:
A pendant made with vibrant green emeralds and vintage green faceted turquoise balls from the Hubei region of China, this is such a great colour and would brighten up any outfit.

Hung on a 16 inch sterling popcorn chain this is a one of a kind piece.

name: Just Peachy
description:
A beautiful coloured pendant made with a 39.98 carat piece of emerald cut quartz which is just stunning, I've added a natural fresh water pearl in the same warm shade and a scattering of watermelon tourmalines in peach, burgundy and lilacs.  I have finished with a hand coiled pendant bail done in 24 k gold filled wire which makes the pendant 3 1/2 cm long and just under 2 cm wide, with a 16 inch gold vermeil chain.

Like all of my jewellery this is one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Seraphim
description:
A rainbow of colours explode when these stones are hit by the light, an AAA string of rainbow moonstones which are the goddess Dianas stone and are said to bring passionate love and good fortune.

At the center of the necklace is a hand cut polished cabochon of a much rarer stone, seraphinite . This gemstone stone  is so etheral with  shimmering patterns on  sea green, the name comes from the Seraphim angels and is said to establish connections to the angelic realm. 

I have added a square silver patterned clasp to mirror the shape of the pendant and the length of the necklace is 48.4 cm.

Like all of my pieces this is a one off and is available for layaway.

name: Galaxy
description:
A truly unique piece in lilacs and white, a pendant made with a large AAA amethyst briolette weighing 9.78 carats, a smooth violet amethyst and a piece of solar quartz which is a cut and polished slice of stalactite.
Hung on a 16 inch sterling silver chain this is really pretty and would suit any age group.

name: Sparkle..
description:
Fun one of a kind necklace in sky blue and rainbow white.

This piece starts with a 17 inch sterling silver chain to which I've added a mix of large pear cut blue quartz, iolite briolettes and a final flourish of large rainbow moonstone briolettes to catch the blues.

name: Starburst
description: Beautiful wired pendant and, these are fabulous AAA aquamarine briolette pears mixed with small round facet cut briolettes hung on sterling silver wire to make a simple but fabulous pendant which comes on a 17 inch chain.

name: Moonlight
description: Cute pendant with iridescent white and blue, AAA tanzanite brioletess in iris blue and lilac jade are mixed with moonstone, pearls and solar quartz for a one of a kind cluster pendant, hung on a 16 inch sterling silver chain.

name: Taj
description:
Echoes of the  Taj Mahal roof in the shape of this pendant in shades of pink, starting with marquise shaped pink amethysts and mixed with pink sapphires and tourmalines.

Simple in its cleanness but transformed when worn and it on a 16 inch gold filled chain and like all of my jewellery is a one off.

Available for layaway.

name: Triple
description:
A ooak necklace to get you noticed, a triple pendant made from smokey, Madeira and citrine quartz ranging from 20.79 carats upwards, each stone has been hand wired separately with a coiled bail so you can wear one or all three pendants.
Sitting on a gold vermeil chain that is 17 inches long, like all my pieces this is available for layaway.

name: Iced Melon
description:
A long 35 inch delicate necklace great to wear with a long tunic top or short dress.

Pear shaped briolette in the palest ice pink faceted quartz dropping from a hand cast piece of sterling silver filigree which is framed with two faceted amethysts in the same shade of pale pink.

name: Nidsummer Nights Dream
description:
Ethereal necklace in shimmering tones of grey and peacock green.

A one of a kind piece made with hand wired Canadian labradorite coins to make a 55 cm necklace finished with a 24k gold vermeil toggle. The pendant is made with a 5cm quartz oval and a single labradorite and gold vermeil spacers.

name: Calypso
description:
Colourful cluster pendant in vibrant colours of aqua and lilac.

An unusual cut apatite coloured quartz with a pretty sea green chalcedony and a mix of amethysts from Brazil and Africa, chalcedony and two sterling silver patterned beads on a 17 inch sterling silver popcorn chain.

name: In the Pink
description: Fabulous coloured rubies in a deep shade of pink, hand wired in a shower onto strands of fine sterling chain, the final stones on this piece are three jelly rubies in the same pretty colour.

name: Raspberry Swirl
description:
Vibrant pendant in shades of pink gardenia, cactus flower and fuschia.

Long link chain with a cluster of pink quartz flat pear drops, round cut topaz briolette and hand faceted Indian pink sapphires, fall in a shower to make a 7 cm pendant with a matching 17 inch sterling silver chain.

name: Sky
description:
Beautiful coloured AAA tanzanite drop necklace, with small clusters of briolette cut tanzanites and faceted pears in the most fantastic colour. 

Each stone has been hand wired onto a 17 inch sterling silver chain to make a one of a kind necklace.

name: Alice
description:
An elegant belle epoque styled necklace inspired by Alice In Wonderland with the blue topaz for her dress and white pearls for her pinafore. I started with a  sterling silver filigree centerpiece and added a perfect spiral cut sky blue topaz briolette measuring 16.26 carats.
I've added some natural freshwater pearls at the front which connect the chain and finished with extra detail at the back with more pearls, a 16 inch necklace which is simple but striking piece.

Like all of my jewellery this is one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Big Red
description:
Definitely not wallflower jewellery, a handmade sterling silver square pendant with three large vibrant red quartz drops totalling 32.54 carats with a scattering of colour matched ruby briolettes hung on a 16 inch sterling silver chain.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.

name: Blue Eyes
description: A really pretty ooak piece made with two pieces of  pear and oval cut larimar , it's a rare stone and comes from the Dominican Republic ,they are a beautiful shade of clear sky blue and have been put into rub over settings and mixed with ivory fresh water pearls and hung on a 17 inch sterling silver chain for a hint of the Caribbean.

name: Neptune
description:
This is a great mix of shape and colour in a range of blues and aquamarine and deep peacock blues.
 A statement piece with a stunning triangle cut blue topaz as its focal, I have added a scattering of tiny sterling silver beads through the necklace and finished with an artisan made sterling toggle clasp with the raised texture of a sea anemone, the necklace is 44.5 cm ling.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique item.
Available for layaway.

name: Reef
description:
A really unique piece made with antique coral beads from Sicily, they are a wonderful warm spicy colour that just glows and looks great whatever your skin tone. I've added disc shaped pearls and orange tourmalines to compliment the large barrel shaped coral and used round natural freshwater pearls for the main body of the necklace.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.

Available for layaway.

name: Candy
description:
Beautiful ooak multi stranded necklace of shaded watermelon tourmalines cut into smooth ovals and individually wire wrapped 24kgold vermeil wire, the colours run from rosy pink to a deep pine green.

The shortest chain is 43.5cm and the longest is 52cm.

name: Purple Rain
description:
A truly stunning AAA checkerboard cut violet 14 x 14 amethyst that is just gorgeous.
Set in a heavy gold vermeil setting and suspended on a 44 cm vermail chain it has a shower of amethyst briolettes falling to a cluster that  surrounds the pendant bail.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.

name: Coffee
description:
Rich brown AAA eye clean quartz which are hand cut into lovely big nuggets, I've hand wired each stone with 24 k gold vermeil wire and kept it simple by using grown satin ribbon as ties.
This piece can be worn at any length you choose from choker, to waist length.
Like all of my jewellery this is one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Cascade
description:
An ooak hippy chic necklace in a mix of summer colours.

I've started with a 36 inch necklace as the base which can be worn in different ways.The stones are watermelon tourmaline which have been hand wired onto 24k gold vermeil, I have added a simple gold vermeil toggle clasp and finally added a pendant.

The pendant itself is a mix of multi coloured gemstones that compliment the chain: a gold vermeil filigree bead, pink sapphire,ruby, amethysts, tourmaline , citrine and finished with a green amethyst drop.

Like all of my jewellery this is one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Jellybean
description:
A statement necklace with a removable pendant, a double stranded chain made with smooth jellybean shaped watermelon tourmalines which has been hand wired onto24k gold vermeil wire.
Hung from a fancy gold vermeil bail the pendant is made with a large ivory baroque pearl which is surrounded with a cluster of gemstones including tourmaline, aquamarine, opal, green apatite, ruby, citrine and pink sapphires.
It also comes with a green quartz pendant which can be worn at its longest lenght.

name: Snow White
description:
'Mirror,mirror on the wall, who is the fairest of them all ?"

Who doesn't remember the quote from Snow White which inspired this pendant . A statement piece made with a cluster of beautiful AAA blood red ruby briolettes falling in a shower to a large creamy white pearl drop, with a gold vermeil bead and final ruby to finish off. 

The total length of the pendant is 5.5 cm and comes on a 16 inch gold filled chain.

name: Jaipur
description:
Fabulous statement 83cm necklace in the bright vibrant colours of India, perfect with a shirt or tunic for something casual but elegant.

A hand cast sterling silver pendant with a rainbow mix of gemtones, peridot, iolite, amethyst, citrine, topaz and garnet forms the centerpiece between two strands of  cool ivory freshwater seed pearls with a scattering of gemstones, aquamarine, peridot, amethyst, iolite, ruby and citrine, echoing the colours in the pendant.

name: Out of Africa
description:
Beautiful coloured AAA purple tanzanite made into a fabulous elegant pendant.
Hung on a 17 inch gold vermeil chain this piece comes in a mix of faceted pears and briolettes totalling 9.23 carats, it's quite simple but very striking.

name: Emerald City
description:
Fantastic 17 inch  necklace in a beautiful shades of grass green and gold.

My photos don't show how fabulous these emeralds are, each one is an AAA hand cut  bead which unusually for emeralds have no treatment at all ( they are usually oiled to enhance the stone) these are amazing stones clear stones which are graded in size.
The center of the necklace has a hammered 24k gold vermeil bead and is finished off with 24k vermeil s hook.

name: Emperor
description:
Alexandrite is a stone of prosperity and longevity, it is said to balance mind and emotions, pacify  the  soul and bring good luck.
The boldest and deepest violet stones, the colour associated with Roman emperors and royalty, this is a one of a kind statement piece.

I've mixed different sized smooth polished pears of colour change alexandrite with big bold African amethysts in the same deep shade of purple. Inter spaced with gold vermeil beads to finish the piece and give it added richness, the necklace is just under 42 cm in length and is finished with a gold vermeil twisted toggle clasp. 

Like my other pieces is one of a kind and available for layaway.

name: Betty Draper
description:
My ode to Mad Men, a mint condition 1960's brooch with green rhinestones.  
I  have added some pretty colour matched peridot  rondelles and a gold vermeil extender chain to to make a fab one off  necklace with hint of 60's flair, finished with a large natural pearl which has been topped and tailed with more perdiot.
This piece goes from 40cm to 55 cm at its longest

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.

name: Ava
description:
Part of a 1930's parure which I have split and made into two pieces.

The centerpiece of the necklace is an emerald green glass swag, which I have added to fresh water pearls and Brazilian emerald briolettes for a unique and one off 48cm necklace.

name: Lana
description:
Fabulous Lana Turner style simplicity with a pretty,pretty rhinestone bow brooch from the 1950's.

Large soft toned mixed pearls which range from cream to a lovely pale peach in colour and finished with a white gold vermeil toggle.
47 cm in length

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.

name: Hedy Lamarr
description:
A great piece named after one of the most stunning movie stars of the 1940's, often wearing pearls in her publicity shots.
The second half of a 1930's parure which I have split and played around with, an emerald glass brooch made into a necklace with a double strand of natural fresh water pearls which is stunning on and  can be worn from 44cm to 53cm  with the extender.

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.

name: Bewitched
description:
Statement piece in a popping cobalt blue colour, I loved bewitched and I can just see Agnes Moorehead in this necklace.

An unusual shaped rhinestone brooch from the late 1940's that is in perfect condition,  sitting as the center piece amongst keishi pearls in the same shade of blue, this is a totally unique piece that measures 42 cm in total.

name: Blue Orchid
description:
Totally unique one of a kind 17inch  necklace made with large smokey blue coloured mystic quartz briolettes and a healthy mix of bling.

At the center is a 1940's flower spray which I've added to a pair of buttons and the last of some vintage  ear cuffs, all in sparkling white diamantes. In between each quartz bead is a sterling silver daisy spacer, finishing with a run of sterling silver spacers and a sterling toggle clasp.

name: Blossom
description: Cute ivory and gold earrings made with natural freshwater pearls and a cluster of gold vermeil flowers with claw set crystals at the centers, these have lovely curved ear wires in the same antique gold finish as the flowers and measure in at 5cm.

name: Dusted Lilac
description: Spring has finally hit and the lilacs are out so here is my ode, a 19 cm freshwater pearl bridal bracelet with AAA aquality pale lilac amethysts in lovely clear losenge shapes and small faceted briolettes.

name: Coco
description: Great vintage style brooch which is 1980's I think, made into a necklace, with large ivory fresh water pearls.The brooch has a scalloped bottom which is very thirties in feel and would be perfect with a simple wedding dress and is 17 inches in length

name: Amalfi
description: A deep lemon shade of rare yellow aquamarine which is so pretty and unusual, I have mixed this with a large natural fresh water pearl with gold vermeil and strung it on an 18 inch gold filled chain, a great basic every day piece.

name: Peach Mallow
description:
Elegant pair of sterling silver chandelier earrings with unctuous blush coloured freshwater pearls, light weight and easy to wear all day, great with jeans or summer dress.
From the top of the ear wires these are 7 cm in total length from the top of the ear wires and like all of my jewellery these are one of a kind and available for layaway

name: Angels Tears
description:
Elegant pair of smaller earrings just as good with a little black dress as a bridal gown.

White topaz are set into 24k gold vermeil and mixed with two natural freshwater pearls for simplicity.

name: Heaven
description: The perfect wedding pendant that you will continue to wear, white topaz set into clover shaped sterling silver which had a coating of white gold for extra shine. This ooak piece had a large pearl drop and a smaller freshwater pearl underneath the bail and comes on a 16 inch sterling silver chain.

name: Mermaids Tear
description:
A mix of different sized ivory pearls in this simple and stylish bracelet, I've added clear blue aquamarines and tear shaped AAA sky blue topaz briolettes, finished with a gold filled ball clasp this would be a lovely bridal piece and would compliment any dress.

This measures just under 22cm and is available for layaway.

name: Pearl Dew
description:
Vintage style necklace made from large pearl drops and hand faceted rock quartz which really sparkle like drops of water when they catch the light, hand wired to a 16 inch sterling silver chain to make a simple but pretty necklace with a pair of matching earrings and  would be just as great with a little black dress

Like all of my jewellery, there is only one of these to ensure that each of my customers receives a completely unique piece.
Available for layaway.
